charges.name: assault
charges.chargeWording: On the 15th day of December 2023 in the said State, committed assault against Jane Doe.

charges.name: theft
charges.chargeWording: On the 15th day of December 2023 in the said State, took property namely a mobile phone, without the consent of Jane Doe, the owner of that property, dishonstly or intending to make a serious encroachment into her proprietary rights.

cfelEntries.entryText: Explored a new hiking trail in the mountains today. Breathtaking views!
Completed a challenging coding project. Celebrating the success!
Attended a fascinating tech conference and learned about the latest innovations.
Cooked a delicious homemade meal for the family. Everyone loved it!
Started a new book today. Couldn't put it down - it's that engaging!
